content:
# FACTORIO REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at (-9.5, 1.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 1.5)
- Boiler at position (-5.0, 4.5)
- Steam engine at position (0.5, 8.5)
- Connected with pipes
The system is currently not functioning properly as the boiler is out of fuel.

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at (30.0, 86.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (30.0, 86.0)
- Wooden chest at position (30.5, 87.5) to collect iron ore
- Burner inserter at position (31.5, 87.5) to move ore from chest
- Second burner mining drill at position (36.0, 90.0)
- Second wooden chest at position (36.5, 91.5) to collect iron ore
Both mining drills are currently out of fuel.

### Iron Smelting Area at (43.0, 89.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (43.0, 89.0)
- Second stone furnace at position (51.0, 92.0)
Both furnaces are currently out of fuel and have no ingredients to smelt.

### Iron Gear Wheel Assembly at (56.5, 94.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (56.5, 94.5) set to produce iron gear wheels
- Input inserter at position (54.5, 94.5)
- Output inserter at position (58.5, 94.5)
- Input chest at position (52.5, 94.5) to feed iron plates
- Output chest at position (59.5, 94.5) to collect iron gear wheels
- Power poles connecting the assembly area
The system is currently not functioning as it's not receiving electricity.

### Electrical Network
Consists of:
- Multiple small electric poles connecting the steam engine to the assembly area
The network is not currently providing power as the steam engine is not operating.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities in occupied or unsuitable locations
- Before placing entities, check if the target location is suitable and not occupied by another entity
- Use the entity's bounding box information to ensure there's enough space
- Avoid placing entities on water or other unplaceable terrain

### Errors when connecting entities with transport belts
- Transport belts cannot connect directly to furnaces or similar processing entities
- Use inserters as intermediaries between belts and processing entities

### Errors when trying to insert items that aren't in inventory
- Check your inventory before attempting to insert items
- Maintain a reserve of coal for refueling operations

### Errors when placing entities near power poles
- Be careful when placing chests near power poles as they may occupy the same space
- Check the exact position before placing entities near existing structures
